content: Brightwood Health System submitted an outpatient claim for CPT 99214 and 20610 for patient #45T9R7P2 on 10/12/2023. The claim notes indicate treatment for bilateral carpal tunnel syndrome with corticosteroid injections. Documentation includes referral from Dr. E. Larson at Northshore Neurology and occupational therapy progress notes from Lakeview Rehab Clinic.
